publicationStmt.p: Digital edition hosted on http://rickandmorty.newtfire.org and GitHub: https://github.com/dorothealint/Rick-and-Morty

encodingDesc.p: Some small changes to the original transcriptions were made including fixed spelling errors and getting rid of parentheses, brackes, and colons.

body.stage: (A giant yellow head flies through space toward Earth. The Earth catches fire and land masses start collapsing as the wind picks up.)
(A man takes a golf swing in the middle of the storm. A large piece of land drops out in front of him, leaving a large hole.)

sp.speaker: Man
sp.p: : Hey, golf is easy now!

body.stage: (The hole gets larger and the man falls in.)

sp.speaker: Man
sp.p: : Aahh! Golf is hard again! Golf is hard agaaaaaaain!

body.stage: (A news anchor in a raincoat, Terry, is downtown with people panicking in the background as the giant head stares blankly at Earth. A news title says “ArmagHEADdon?!”.)

sp.speaker: Terry
sp.p: : The view here is the same as yours, Jim. A giant head has entered Earth’s gravity, triggering climate change and natural disasters we thought were impossible for at least another eight years.

sp.speaker: Jim
sp.p: : (in news studio) Let’s not make this political, Terry. Do we know what this giant head wants?

body.stage: (Giant Head clears its throat, creating a large wind blast)

sp.speaker: Giant Head
sp.p: : SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT.

body.stage: (winds pick up and the tides change rapidly with its speech)

sp.speaker: Terry
sp.p: : Jim, you heard *static* said, “Show me what you got.”

sp.speaker: Giant Head
sp.p: : SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT. I WANT TO SEE WHAT YOU GOT. (lamp post falls over, Terry runs out of frame)

body.stage: (Rick turns off the TV, they are on the couch)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Oh boy. Time to go, Morty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Uhh, where?

body.stage: (Rick puts on sunglasses)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : The Pentagon. I mean, not THE Pentagon. *burp* The lame one, here on Earth.

body.stage: (Rick and Morty walk out of frame)
[INTRO]
(At the house, winds still blow strongly. Summer, Beth and Jerry are standing outside.)

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Is it God? If it’s God, do we get out of school?

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : It’s not God, Summer.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : She’s allowed to think it’s God if she wants, honey!

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Shut up, Jerry.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Ok…

body.stage: (Rick and Morty pull out of the garage in the ship.)

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Dad, what do you know about this?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Morty and I are going to look into it. You guys hold tight.

body.stage: (they fly off)
(Mr. Goldenfold arrives on a moped.)

sp.speaker: Mr. Goldenfold
sp.p: : Scary stuff, huh? Pretty freaky. Hi, I’m Morty’s math teacher. I’m also part of the street team inviting folks to the church downtown so we can pray together.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : How is praying going to help?

sp.speaker: Mr. Goldenfold
sp.p: : Ma’am, a giant head in the sky is controlling the weather. Did you wanna play checkers? Let’s be rational! I’ll see you at God’s house! (leaves)

body.stage: (Pentagon war room, everyone is arguing)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Gentlemen, gentlemen, one at a time! Simon?

sp.speaker: Simon
sp.p: : SETI, NORAD, and every broadcaster on the planet are attempting to show this being what humanity’s got. String theory, world history, the human genome.

body.stage: (Nathan slams fist on table)

sp.speaker: Nathan
sp.p: : Have you tried sending it launch codes? Mr. President, what America’s got is 70,000 megatons of KABOOM-BOOM! And I say we show it right up this floating head’s ass!

body.stage: (Argument begins again. A portal appears and Rick and Morty step through.)

sp.speaker: Guards
sp.p: : Hold it! Don’t move! (they approach Rick and Morty with guns)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Stay back! This watch turns people into snakes!

body.stage: (Guards stop and look at Nathan for approval. Nathan nods at them, and the guards aim. A laser fires at the guards and they disappear, leaving only snakes.)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Stand down. Everybody stand down! I’m the leader of these people and I’m unarmed. There’s no need for any more snake-makery.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : My name is Rick Sanchez. This here’s my grandson Morty. (drinks from flask)

sp.speaker: Everyone
sp.p: : Hi, Morty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Hey.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I’ve seen enough of the galaxy to know that what we’ve got here is a Cromulon from the Cygnus-5 Expanse. So you can forget about nukes, and you can forget about math. (points to viewscreen showing floating head) This head won’t go away until *burp* Earth shows them it’s got a hit song.

sp.speaker: Everyone
sp.p: : Seriously, that’s impossible, etc…

sp.speaker: Simon
sp.p: : You mean like Vivaldi?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : No, Frasier. A live performance of a newly-written, catchy, original song. The Cromulon feed on the talent and showmanship of less-evolved lifeforms.

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : All right, all right. Thank you, Mr. Sanchez. Change of plan, people. Get me Pharrell, Randy Newman, Billy Corgan, and The-Dream. (no one responds) The-Dream? He wrote “Umbrella” and “Single Ladies”? You people haven’t heard of The-Dream?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : You’re gonna wanna put them on that giant speaker system at your sonic testing facility at Area 51.

sp.speaker: Nathan
sp.p: : How do you know about that?

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : For God’s sake, Nathan, the man turns people into snakes. He can use Google Maps.

sp.speaker: Aide
sp.p: : Sir! Pharrell, Newman, Corgan, and that Dream guy. They’re all dead.

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : What? How is that possible? Do people just die when I name them?

sp.speaker: Aide
sp.p: : The Grammys, sir. There was an earthquake and all the musicians... (sniffs, holding back tears) All the famous ones, they’re gone.

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Dear God.

sp.speaker: Aide
sp.p: : Hold on, sir, just a minute. Ice-T survived. He’s inbound on an F-15, ETA two hours.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Good luck, Mr. President.

sp.speaker: Simon
sp.p: : Sir, the magnetic poles are about to reverse. In two hours, there may not be an Earth to save.

body.stage: (Rick opens a portal)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Sanchez! Are you a musician?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I dabble, Mr. President.

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Get this man and his grandson on a Blackhawk to Area 51.

body.stage: (At the church, everyone is panicking.)

sp.speaker: Pastor Bob
sp.p: : People! Everyone! Remain calm! Every crisis of faith is an opportunity for more faith! When God deals you an 11, you don’t fold! You double down, and always hit on a soft 16. That means you, Jews.

sp.speaker: Jew
sp.p: : I beg your pardon, pastor, but the last I looked outside, it seems to be you that’s been dealt the weak hand. Jews rule! (no one responds) Nobody? Ok, tough church.

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: Hi, Principal Vagina. The name’s real, possibly Scandinavian. I’m just gonna come out and make this pitch. The old gods are dead. F*** all previous existing religions. All hail the one true god, the giant head in the sky.

body.stage: (everyone reacts)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: Ah, di di di di. (to Bob) Bob, Bob, I get it. But unless this (holds up a necklace with a cross) can beat that… what have you done for me lately? (tosses necklace to Bob) So if you wanna excuse me, I’m going out on the sidewalk and dropping to my knees and pledging my eternal soul to the thing that literally controls the f***ing weather! (walks out) Outta my way!

sp.speaker: Pastor Bob
sp.p: : Ok, if sanity’s been restored to this assembly, I’d like to talk about the cost of repairing our new organ. Sally, the plate, please.

sp.speaker: Mr. Goldenfold
sp.p: : (holds up a dollar) Ohhhh, this is my favorite part!

body.stage: (Helicopters over the desert, subtitle “Nevada Desert: Restricted Air Space”. Rick and Morty are on a helicopter)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Rick, are you really a musician?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Who’s NOT a musician, Morty?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Me!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Yeah, not with that attitude.

sp.speaker: Jump Master
sp.p: We’re in the drop zone! I’m the jump master! My name’s Jamey! With an E-Y! Go, go, go! (Rick slides down rope)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : B-b-but we don’t have a song!

body.stage: (Outside the church, Principal Vagina is on the sidewalk on his knees)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: Giant head in the sky, please forgive all that we’ve done. We’re sorry for increased levels of emissions and our racism. And of course, the amber alerts I keep ignoring on my phone.

body.stage: (At Area 51 speaker system, Rick and Morty slide down rope out of helicopter)
In unison

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : WhooooOOOOAHHHH!!!!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : WhooooOOOOAHHHH!!!!

body.stage: End unison
(They land on a stage with various live performance equipment on it. The yellow Cromulon is in front of the stage staring.)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : (picks up a microphone) All right, Morty, let’s get ready to do it! Why don’t you, uh, find a button on one of those keyboards and lay down some kind of beat?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Rick, I think we need to cut our losses. We get our family and portal out of here!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Morty! Good music comes from people who are relaxed. Just hit a button, Morty! Gimme a beat!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Oh man, ok, all right, um…

body.stage: (Morty presses a key and a beat starts, Rick knocks over a mic stand and starts “singing”)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p:
: Ahhhhh yeahhhhh
Ya gotta get schwifty
(Morty starts beating a tambourine in rhythm)
Ya gotta get schwifty in here
It’s time to get schwifty

body.stage: (The President and Nathan are watching the performance on a screen inside)

sp.speaker: Nathan
sp.p: : Get… schwifty? What the hell is that?

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : It’s our world’s best effort, that’s what.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p:
: Take off your pants and your panties
Shit on the floor
Time to get schwifty in here
I’m Mr. Bulldops

sp.speaker: Nathan
sp.p: : Mr. Bulldops?

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Don’t analyze it, Nathan. It’s working!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p:
: Take a shit on the floor
Time to get schwifty in here

body.stage: (Weather starts to die down around the world)
(At the church)

sp.speaker: Pastor Bob
sp.p: : And third-level donors get our all access family pass.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Listen! The storm is stopping!

body.stage: (On the stage)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p:
: Hey, take your pants off
It’s schwifty time today

body.stage: (song ends)

sp.speaker: Giant Head
sp.p: : Hmmmm.

body.stage: (everyone at Area 51 waits in anticipation)
(at the church)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: Please be kind to us for we are but tiny things with entire bodies stuck to your ground.

body.stage: (at the stage)

sp.speaker: Giant Head
sp.p: : I LIKE WHAT YOU GOT. GOOD JOB.

body.stage: (Giant Head flies away)
(everyone at Area 51 cheers and celebrates)
(at the church, everyone lifts Principal Vagina, “What do you know, he was right! Hooray Principal Vagina!”)

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Now hold on a second, let’s be rational about this.

body.stage: (everyone stops and stares at Beth)

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : No, I’m… I’m just saying, we don’t know if there’s a cause-effect relationship --

body.stage: (earthquake hits, Beth falls on ground)

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Oh, God, what’s going on now?

body.stage: (at the stage, Rick and Morty and Area 51 panic)
(At Area 51)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : What the hell happened?

sp.speaker: Aide
sp.p: : Mr. President, you’re gonna wanna see this.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I think planet Earth has just been transported.

body.stage: (At the church)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: The head has left and sent its children!

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Holy CRAP!

body.stage: (everyone gets on their knees)

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Oh dear giant head, we apologize for that discussion! It will never happen again!

body.stage: (everyone starts murmuring prayers)
(At Area 51)

sp.speaker: Simon
sp.p: : Sir, we’ve started picking up on a garbled signal. We’re decrypting it now.

body.stage: (screen gradually descrambles)
(Screen shows different bands of different aliens on different stages. Dance music plays in the background as the Cromulon narrates.)

sp.speaker: Cromulon
sp.p: WE ASKED THEM TO SHOW US WHAT THEY GOT. AND THEY DID. NOW WE’LL SEE WHICH OF THEM HAS GOT THE MOST. 24 HOURS, FIVE PLANETS, FIVE SONGS. BUT IN THE END, THERE CAN ONLY BE ONE. PLANET MUSIC! All participation is involuntary. Disqualified and losing planets are disintegrated by plasma ray.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Uhh, it’s probably a bad time to mention it, but any astronauts you guys had in orbit are definitely dead.

body.stage:
ACT 2
(dance music plays, Planet Music opening shows)

sp.speaker: Cromulon
sp.p: Welcome back to Planet Music! First up, let’s hear the latest song from planet Parblesnops. The Greebybobes! SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT.

sp.speaker: Greebybobe
sp.p: Hold it, hold it, stop! Music isn’t about competition or captivity! If you love music, you love freedom. Let these worlds be free, please!

sp.speaker: Cromulon
sp.p: DISQUALIFIED!

body.stage: (plasma ray powers up and fires at the planet, blowing it up)

sp.speaker: Cromulon
sp.p: There’s one every season. Moving on to planet Arbolez Meterosos. Arbolian Meterososians. SHOW US WHAT YOU GOT.

sp.speaker: Arbolian Meterososian
sp.p: Ah two, three, four…

body.stage: (The Arbolian Meterososians play a very simple and underwhelming song while looking at the Cromulons for approval.)
(At Area 51. Rick, Morty and Ice-T are in a studio with several instruments. Rick is playing a bass, Morty is poking at a keyboard, and Ice-T is in the corner. The aide comes in.)

sp.speaker: Aide
sp.p: : Rick, Morty, Ice-T. The timetable’s moved up. Earth’s on in six hours.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Like we’re not already under enough pressure! (Morty flips a bowl of peanuts at the aide and it hits him in the head. The aide leaves.)

body.stage: In unison

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Whoa ho ho ho ho!

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: : Whoa ho ho ho ho!

body.stage: End unison

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Geez, Morty. The guy’s just doing his job. Take it easy.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Rick, Ice-T, could you guys take it less easy?! We’ve got six hours to come up with a song!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Genius happens in the moment, Morty. (walks over to keyboard)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Well, can we at least go get our family? You know, so we can take them with-with-with us if we lose?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : That’s planning for failure, Morty. Even dumber than regular planning. (presses a button on the keyboard) Balls.

body.stage: (Morty walks toward the portal gun)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Morty, Morty, stop! Listen! There’s only so much charge left in this thing. If we portal home from here and back, we’re not gonna have enough charge left to get off-world. Get it?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What?!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Yeah, *burp* you see, I try to shelter you from certain realities, *burp* Morty. Cause if I let you make me nervous, then we can’t get schwifty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Stop saying it like it’s a thing! You made it up!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Hey, Morty! Could you lick my… (Rick presses keys on the keyboard with the sample of him saying “Balls”)

body.stage: (The President, Nathan, and his aide are watching them through a window)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Rick, cut it out! That’s not funny, Rick!

sp.speaker: Nathan
sp.p: : I’ve seen enough. These guys are one-hit wonders.

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : And what’s your plan, General?

sp.speaker: Nathan
sp.p: : We still have the nuclear option. On my word, we can launch a nuclear missile at every one of those heads in the sky.

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Our planet’s held captive on a live game show and your solution is to shoot the audience? You can put your faith in nukes if we get through this, General. Until then, I’ll put mine in Rick and Morty. “Get Schwifty” was a jam.

body.stage: (in field outside church, everyone is dressed in robes wearing head hats. Principal Vagina is holding a homemade satellite on a stick with an earbud)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: Hello? Yes sir, yeah. Thank you sir, thank you. He says he’s proud of what we’re doing and hopes we have a great Ascension Festival! Happy Ascension!

sp.speaker: All
sp.p: Happy Ascension!

body.stage: (Jerry is holding an ice cream cone, Beth looks unimpressed.)

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : We should pack up and leave town now.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : I think it’s inspiring that our community is coping with fear in a way that involves a festival and homemade ice cream. If you’d stop being such an evangelical atheist, you might start enjoying yourself.

body.stage: (Summer arrives wearing a head hat, holding two head hats. Beth double-facepalms.)

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Whoa! Look at you! You’re wearing the hat and everything!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Here’s yours! (puts hat on Jerry) Mom, do you mind if I cook dinner tonight?

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Yeah, sure. Wait, what??

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : I love you guys. You gave me life. And it’s the will of the many heads that all children honor their parents.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Dinner sounds nice.

body.stage: (Ethan arrives.)

sp.speaker: Ethan
sp.p: Pardon, Mr. and Mrs. Smith. Summer, are you coming to the Ascension?

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Father, can we please go to the Ascension?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Sure! Let’s go to the Ascension. Wh-wh-what is it?

body.stage: (Three people are each tied to a bunch of balloons, tethered to a stake in the ground. One is labeled “Thief”, another labeled “Goth”, and the third labeled “Movie Talker”.)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: We hereby send these un-wantables skyward that they might be inhaled by the many heads, later to be sneezed back to us as better babies! (cuts first rope) Headward, free now to rise. (cuts second rope) Headward, free now to rise. (cuts third rope) Headward, free now to rise.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Oh yes, yes! Rise to the giant head! You are free to be free!

body.stage: (in the studio)

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: A squeegee comes up from the garage, right? And he’s got a lobster in one hand and movie tickets in the other. He’s like, “I’m ready!”

body.stage: (Rick and Ice-T laugh)

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: Who would take a lobster to see Iron Man 3?

body.stage: (Rick and Ice-T laugh)

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: Aw, damn. We’re out of original flavor Fig Newtons. I should get going anyway.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Wait, wait, wait! Come on, h-hold on a second!

body.stage: (Rick grabs the portal gun, hits a couple buttons, makes a portal in the floor and drops through it. Another portal appears in the ceiling and Rick drops out of it with several snacks.)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What?!

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: Damn. You didn’t tell me you f*** around with portals and shit.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : That’s it!

body.stage: (Morty grabs the portal gun and gets up.)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Whoa, whoa! Morty! Give me that!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : You lied! You lied about the charge! You were just being lazy! Get back! Sit down!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Morty, just put it down. You don’t know what you’re doing.

body.stage: (Morty turns to a wall and fires a portal.)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : I’m going to go find Mom and Dad.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Nooooo!

body.stage: (Morty jumps through the portal and Rick tries to grab him, but the portal closes.)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Ahhhh, sh**!

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Ah, sh**.

body.stage: (Morty steps through different portals to different worlds, ending up in Buttworld.)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Ahhh, sh**.

body.stage: (Outside of the Smiths’ home, Summer, Beth and Jerry are hoeing the front yard.)

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : And then Ethan played guitar and we learned the Seven Contemplations of the Head by singing them. It was really fun. Praise be the head!

body.stage: In unison

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Praise be the…

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Praise be the…

body.stage: End unison

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Yeah.

body.stage: (Principal Vagina arrives on a bicycle with a seat, bell ringing.)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: Hi folks, Head Priest Vagina. Thanks for farming all those potatoes. It’s 6 p.m., so if you’re a parent, you’re now entitled to adoration from your children.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : I’m going to start dinner! (walks into the house)

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : I don’t know what to say. Summer is doing really well here.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : She’s aced every test in potato class, and look how important potatoes have become.

body.stage: (Someone tied to balloons floats by in the background with label “Inappropriate Joke Teller”.)

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : She’s not getting pregnant or doing drugs or missing curfew…

sp.speaker: Balloon Man
sp.p: : Please help me! You can reach me if you try. Please help me!!

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : That’s not our business as long as Summer is thriving!

body.stage: (Inside the Smiths’ house, Summer serves dinner at the table.)

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Taco time! (Summer pulls off the lid to reveal exactly 12 tacos.) I hope it pleases you as the head desires.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : That’s wonderful, Summer!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : We’re so proud of you. But honestly, you don’t have to make dinner every night.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Of course I do, silly! (gasps and drops lid) Oh my God, daddy, I’m sorry I called you silly! I’m so sorry! (turns around and drops to knees) Heavenly head and cranial creator! Forgive my transgressions against family and community! May my chores complete me as I complete them!

body.stage: (Summer sulks out of the dining room and up the stairs.)
(Morty stumbles out of a portal on a green world and collapses to the ground holding the portal gun. A figure looms over Morty, pokes him with a stick, then rolls him over.)

sp.speaker: Birdperson
sp.p: : Morty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Birdperson?

sp.speaker: Birdperson
sp.p: : You appear to be dying. I will make efforts to prevent this, but can promise nothing.

body.stage: (In the studio, Rick plays with the keyboard and Ice-T is in the corner on his phone.)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Wh-What do you think, Ice? Probably a little over-developed.

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: Shit. Over-developed, under-developed. Bad songs are bad songs.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Well, do you think maybe, could you give me some help with it, or… ?

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: Ah, hell no, man. You do your thing, but I can’t afford to get my pride wrapped up in your shame. You know what I’m sayin’?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Ice, I don’t want to be a negative Nelly or anything, but *burp* if Morty doesn’t come back with my portal gun and I eat it out there, it’s, uh, kind of your problem too.

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: Pfff. I ain’t worried about no Earth blowin’ up, man.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : What? Why not?

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: Yo, this is why.

body.stage: (Ice-T transforms into a floating ice shard with the same face.)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : What the f***? You can turn into ice?

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: My story begins at the dawn of time in the far away realm of Alphabetrium. There, every being is a letter of the alphabet. But I was frozen and exiled to the cosmos by my elders as punishment for not caring enough about anything. Earth is just one of the many stops on my lifelong journey with no destination. So you better believe I don’t care if it blows up! Cause I’ll just be ice, floatin’ through space, like a comet!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Take it from me, Ice. *burp* You can’t just *burp* float around space not caring about stuff forever.

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: Pshhhh. Man, watch me. Good luck, Rick.

body.stage: (Ice-T blasts out of the ceiling of the studio.)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Ok, things are getting out of hand. I better make sure Rick has everything he needs to “get schwifty.”

sp.speaker: Nathan
sp.p: : Oh, for God’s sake, that’s enough.

body.stage: (Nathan pulls a gun on the President)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : What the hell are you doing, Nathan? I’m the goddamn President of the United f***in’ States!

sp.speaker: Nathan
sp.p: : I’m setting the nuclear option to launch one minute into Earth’s performance. And you, Mr. President, I hope you like being hit in the face with a gun!

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Wait, wait, wait, why-why --

body.stage: (Nathan pistol-whips the President and he falls to the ground.)
(At Birdperson’s residence, Birdperson serves Morty a bowl of food and tinkers with the portal gun.)

sp.speaker: Birdperson
sp.p: : I believe I can access the history of Rick’s gun and help you get back to him.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : But can you help me get to my family? You know, at my house?

sp.speaker: Birdperson
sp.p: : Is your intention to abandon Rick using his own portal gun? In bird culture, this is considered a dick move.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : All of Rick’s moves are dick moves! Wh-what am I eating? What is this, bird seed?

sp.speaker: Birdperson
sp.p: : It is random debris. I found it in my carpet. I don’t know what humans eat.

body.stage: (Tammy arrives wearing a bathrobe.)

sp.speaker: Tammy
sp.p: : You know what THIS human eats!

sp.speaker: Birdperson
sp.p: : Don’t be gross, Tammy.

sp.speaker: Tammy
sp.p: : (leans over to Morty and whispers) Bird… d***.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Tammy… gross. Birdperson, you always stick up for Rick, but he doesn’t care about anyone but himself. He doesn’t think about the consequences of anything he does.

sp.speaker: Birdperson
sp.p: : And as a result, he has the power to save or destroy entire worlds. And he is the reason you and I know each other. And the reason I’m alive at all.

body.stage: (Birdperson points to a wall of photos of himself and Rick together. Last shown is Rick holding a baby.)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What’s that? Who’s that baby?

sp.speaker: Birdperson
sp.p: : Morty, suppose you could retrieve your family from Earth but had to abandon Rick. I could give your loved ones shelter on Birdworld, even jobs, possibly as worm ranchers. How often do you think you might look up at the stars and wonder what might have been had you just put your faith in Rick?

body.stage: (Morty stands in thought for a moment. Planet Music starts back up on the TV.)

sp.speaker: Cromulon
sp.p: That was Chunky Tunk with “Full Ming Mong, Empty Gorp Dorp.” Up next, planet Earth!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Oh God! We’re up?!?!

body.stage: (At the church, Principal Vagina and other priests are talking with Jerry and Beth.)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: Jerry and Beth, your family is a golden example of what Headism has to offer the world.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : The world?

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: Headism is a hit. We’re taking it worldwide and would like Jerry to be our church’s “Head” of Advertising.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : You… would?

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: Beth, we’d like to promote you from horse surgeon, straight past human surgeon, to “Head” of Medicine.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : That’s my dream! That’s my dream.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Thank you. This is all so overwhelming, but, uh… we can’t.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Absolutely not.

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: I’m sorry?

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : We’ve been waiting 16 years for our daughter to respect us, but the key is, it has to be “our” daughter, not this person she’s become.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : We’ll take our chances raising her without fancy new jobs outside of a potato-based religion. (turns and puts his hands on Beth’s shoulders) And you know what? I’m sick of pretending that we’re together because of the kids in the first place! I married you because you’re the love of my life!

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : (puts her hands on Jerry’s sides) And I‘m lucky to have you and I never tell you that! You know, we will come out of this stronger as a family!

body.stage: (Cut: Summer has tied Beth and Jerry to ropes and balloons outside.)

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Please don’t do this, please don’t do this! Summer!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Summer, listen carefully. I stole a paper clip and I have it in my cheek but I don’t know what to do with it and it hurts.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : You’re going to be ok! (ties another balloon to them) You will come back as babies!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : I AM a baby! I’m a baby NOW!

body.stage: (In the now empty studio, a portal opens up and Morty steps through.)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Hello? Is anybody here? (looks through the studio window and sees the President tied up) Mr. President!

body.stage: (Morty darts out of the studio to the President and unties him. The President climbs up to the console and presses a button)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : This is Bluebird. Code tango-niner-alpha. Abort launch. Abort! Hello? (releases button) He’s blocked me out.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Sir, I need to get to the stage and help Rick get schwifty!

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : It won’t matter how schwifty you get, Morty. The General’s got nukes set to launch halfway through Earth’s song!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Oh my God! C-c-can you fly a Blackhawk?

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Can the Pope’s d*** fit through a donut?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Uhhh, I’m not sure?

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Exactly!

body.stage: (On the stage, Rick stands before the Cromulons.)

sp.speaker: Cromulon
sp.p: SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Ahem. (starts a low-key, bouncy song) Uhhh… lop-oo-lop-oo-lop-oo-dups, nop-oo-nop-oo-nop-oo-nuts.

body.stage: (Outside the church, Principal Vagina is preparing to cut Beth and Jerry loose. The Cromulons' faces become angry.)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: Headward free now to rise!

sp.speaker: Mr. Goldenfold
sp.p: : Hey! Look at the heads! Looks like the heads are gettin’ angry!

body.stage: (In the desert, the President flies the helicopter clumsily to the stage with Morty in tow.)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : I’m really bad at this, Morty! There are way too many buttons on this thing!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Mr. President, if I’ve learned one thing today, it’s that sometimes, you have to not give a f***!

body.stage: (On the stage, Rick continues his song.)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Nup-oo-nup-oo-nup-oo-nups… ooh, tough crowd.

body.stage: (Outside the church, Principal Vagina is preparing to cut Beth and Jerry loose.)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: I’m sure that has… that has nothing to do with this.

body.stage: (Principal Vagina cuts the rope and the Cromulons immediately start booing.)

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : The heads are displeased! (She jumps and grabs Beth and Jerry’s legs.)

sp.speaker: Ethan
sp.p: Summer! (He jumps and grabs her.)

body.stage: (On the stage Rick continues his song as the Blackhawk arrives. Morty and the President slide down ropes out of the helicopter onto the stage.)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Morty!

body.stage: (The Cromulons begin cheering with “Yay!” and “Hooray!” etc. with smiles on their faces. The now unmanned helicopter crashes off frame.)
(Outside the church, Summer and Ethan are pulling Beth and Jerry down to the ground.)

sp.speaker: Mr. Goldenfold
sp.p: : The heads love this! They love it when we DON’T kill the Smith family!

body.stage: (The balloons are released, but Beth and Jerry are still tied up.)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: No! Stop that! You’re not allowed to interpret the will of the heads!

body.stage: (On the stage, the President grabs the microphone and speaks to the control room staff.)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Call off the nuclear strike! This is the President. Stop the nuclear missile launch!

sp.speaker: Nathan
sp.p: : Just launch the missiles!

body.stage: (Nathan smashes a button and two nuclear missiles emerge from the ground in the desert. The Cromulons watch as the missiles fly toward the yellow Cromulon and lay puny explosions on its chin.)

sp.speaker: Cromulon
sp.p: BOO! NOT COOL!

body.stage: (Outside the church)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: I’m the only one that speaks to the heads!

body.stage: (Cromulon zooms in close to Earth)

sp.speaker: Cromulon
sp.p: DISQUALIFIED!

sp.speaker: Mr. Goldenfold
sp.p: : The heads disqualified Vagina! Get him!

body.stage: (The mob runs toward Principal Vagina. The Cromulon zooms closer.)
(On the stage)

sp.speaker: Cromulon
sp.p: DISQUALIFIED! DISQUALIFIED!

body.stage: (The plasma ray points toward Earth and begins powering up. The control room staff evacuates. The plasma ray heads right for the stage but something flies in the way and blocks it.)

sp.speaker: All
sp.p: Ice-T?

body.stage: (Ice-T slowly crumbles from the plasma ray’s power)

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: That’s right, it’s me, Ice-T! I care now! You made me care more! With all due respect, I’d like to hear what Rick and Morty have to play.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What do you say, Rick?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I say… (grabs mic) Let’s do it!

body.stage: (Morty presses a button on the keyboard and a different beat starts playing. The heads start with “Hooray” etc while smiling. Rick claps over his head and Morty dances a little.)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : All right!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Ohhhh yeahhhh!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Come on, here we go!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Ohhhh yeahhhh!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Say it with me!

sp.speaker: All
sp.p:
Head bent over
Raised up posterior
Head bent over (ahh yeah)
Raised up posterior

body.stage: (Outside the church, Principal Vagina is ties up with balloons and rope. A different person cuts the rope. Vagina sees the heads smiling as he rises.)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: Ohhh my GOOOOODDDD!!!

body.stage: (On the stage)

sp.speaker: All
sp.p:
Head bent over (yeah)
Raised up posterior (oh yeah)
Head bent over (oh yeah)
(Raised up posterior!)

sp.speaker: Cromulon
sp.p: After 988 seasons of Planet Music, the Cromulons have decided to declare Earth the final winner and bring our musical reality show to a conclusion. Goodbye!

body.stage: (Earth is transported back to the right place.)

sp.speaker: All
sp.p: Yeah, we did it!

body.stage: (Outside the church, everyone is still and silent.)

sp.speaker: Mr. Goldenfold
sp.p: : Did he just say “musical reality show”?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Yeah, it’s possible that we may have been correlating some things that weren’t actually related at all.

body.stage: (Principal Vagina floats by in the background.)

sp.speaker: Principal Vagina
sp.p: HEEEEELLLLPPPP!!!!!

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : We should go get him.

body.stage: (At Area 51, everyone is celebrating. The President shakes hands with Morty.)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : I hope I can call on you again if we need you, Morty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Sure thing! And I was kinda hoping that I could get a selfie with you?

body.stage: (The President waves over Secret Service.)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Actually, if you try to tell anyone what happened here, we’ll deny it and probably worse.

body.stage: (A Secret Service agent grabs Morty’s phone and snaps it in half.)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Understood.

body.stage: (Nathan runs toward them with a gun.)

sp.speaker: Nathan
sp.p: : DIIIIEEEE!!!!

body.stage: (He is hit with an energy blast from Rick and disappears.)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : Why didn’t he turn into a snake?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Trade secret, Mr. President. Particle beam in a wristwatch… snake holster on the leg.

body.stage: (He pulls up his pant leg to reveal a holster which a snake crawls out of. The snake slithers away and a soldier whistles impressed. The President begins laughing and hugs Rick.)

sp.speaker: President
sp.p: : I love this man!

body.stage: [CREDITS]
(On Alphabetrium, Ice-T enters a great hall containing his elders: a grey J, a gaseous F with a female face, and a Q made of lava. All three are holding different scepters.)

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: Magnesium-J, Hydrogen-F. Father.

sp.speaker: Magnesium-J
sp.p: : Word of your selfless acts on the Earth planet have travelled across the galaxy.

sp.speaker: Ice-T
sp.p: I have changed. I am ready to rejoin my brethren on Alphabetrium.

sp.speaker: Magnesium-J
sp.p: : Very well. Your exile ends today!

body.stage: (All three press their scepters on the ground and the scepters glow. The beams form another beam that hits Ice-T and transforms him into a letter T made of water.)

sp.speaker: Magnesium-J
sp.p: : Welcome home... Water-T.

body.stage: (The hall shakes and begins falling apart.)

sp.speaker: Purple-P
sp.p: : The Numbericons! They’re attacking!

sp.speaker: Magnesium-J
sp.p: : Battle stations!

body.stage: (A piece of the building falls on Magma-Q. Water-T runs over to him.)

sp.speaker: Water-T
sp.p: : Father!

sp.speaker: Magma-Q
sp.p: : I love you son. I should have never turned you to ice. (He dies.)

body.stage: (Water-T produces a pistol on each T-end and begins walking out.)

sp.speaker: Magnesium-J
sp.p: : Water-T, where are you going? There’s too many of them!

body.stage: (A dramatic zoom to Water-T’s face.)

sp.speaker: Water-T
sp.p: : Then I better crunch the numbers.

body.stage: (Water-T bursts out of the door shooting at several Numbericons. The frame freezes mid-action and we hear gunshots and screaming. A title appears: “This summer: Water-T And The Rise Of The Numbericons.”)
[END]
